title: Aliens in Paris
description: It wasn’t like looking for a needle in a hay-stack, it was like feeling for a needle in a hay barn wearing gloves and a blindfold – that’s what Stephen told me. He was talking about the Search for Extra Terrestrial Life, an impossible pursuit until… two aliens, yes two, landed in Paris.The new release of this short ebook, published exclusively on Good Reads.
author: Sally Ann Melia
